name: Blood N' Justice
description:
Moving WASD

Interacting : E / Left mouse button

Collect blood from patients in the hospital :

if the white line is in the green region, it is safe to interact and get blood from the patient. The vial with the same blood type will fill up over time.

you can sell it to the bartender by left clicking in this location.


And buy a cool hat (after maybe an hour or so)

Vampires be thirsty, 
Landlords be wealthy,
Nurses be searchy,
Hats be stylish

In the unlikely event of your having frame rate issues, we recommend you download the build for a better experience. :)
